author: By RUSS BYNUM Associated Press
title: Island mayor battles Georgia governor over virus limitations
description: SAVANNAH, Ga. (AP) — A small coastal city in Georgia that thrives on tourism closed its beach, fearing carefree crowds of teenagers and college students posed too great a risk for spreading the new coronavirus. Two weeks later, the state's…
